resources.string: In order to win, a player must align 4 discs of his own color vertically, horizontally, or diagonally.
Like in the traditionnal Connect-Four, a player can put a disc in a cell if there is a straight line, from this cell to the bottom border, containing no empty cell.
But unlike the traditionnal game, a disc can also be put in a cell if a straight line without empty cell goes from it to any other border, be it the top, left or right one.
The effect is that of a 4-sided gravity.
The board size can be either 8x8 or 10x10. In order to bring another twist, four cells, near the corners, can be blocked to offer new stragegies.
